name: Stoneworks
description:
Bring statues to life to battle the corrupted legion in 7v7 turn based combat. Build a team from the 4 unique classes with a total of 20 playable units and fight your way across the land to purge the corruption.

Controls:

- Press Tab to view the legend.

- Right click to cancel an action.

- Hold Space to view all health bars.

If you run into any issues with the game, let me know, and I know there's no sound, I just can't make that stuff myself or afford to pay for it.
